instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..
definitions.820-00923: What is 820-00923? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> not ssd detect <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message:

threads.message: Check continuity left/right for all J9600 vias.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> not ssd detect <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message: I don't understand exactly what I need to check. also all type-c inputs are working

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> not ssd detect <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message:
J9600 is just a bypass connector.
Be sure to have good connections from one side to other.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> not ssd detect <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message:
Did I get right ?
ssd won't appear and work if socket isn't in place

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> not ssd detect <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message: Of course, J9600 must be closed...

threads.message:

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> not ssd detect <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
threads.message: You may have connection problems with J9600.
